-- | Build a Delaunay triangulation of a set of points
--   
--   This package provides a single function that builds a Delaunay
--   triangulation of a set of points. Use '--ghc-options=-fllvm' for
--   improved performance.
@package delaunay
@version 0.1.0.2

module Graphics.Triangulation.Delaunay

-- | Generate the Delaunay triangulation of a set of points
triangulate :: [Vector2] -> [(Vector2, Vector2, Vector2)]
instance Eq Pt
instance Show a => Show (UPair a)
instance (Hashable a, Ord a) => Hashable (UPair a)
instance Eq a => Eq (UPair a)
instance Show Pt
instance Ord Pt
instance Hashable Pt
